word_mean: 地衣：由藻类和真菌共生而形成的任何菌藻植物。藻类组分为绿色或紫绿色藻，而菌类则通常为子囊菌
苔癣：指许多不同种类的皮肤丘疹病，其病变特点为小而坚实密集的丘疹，其特定的型别则以特定的术语表示

sentence.Network_en: The stone stairway was covered with lichen.
Lichen is a form in which green or bluegreen algae and a fungus live together symbiotically.
sentence.Network_cn: 地衣是一种绿藻或蓝藻与一种真菌共生的形式.

sentence.Network_en: The case was diagnosed as lichen sclerosus et atrophicus with localized scleroderma.
sentence.Network_cn: 患者诊断为硬化萎缩性苔藓合并局限性硬皮病.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek leikhēn

entry.def: Lichen is a group of tiny plants that looks like moss and grows on the surface of things such as rocks, trees, and walls.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several eruptive skin diseases characterized by hard thick lesions grouped together and resembling lichens growing on rocks
2. any thallophytic plant of the division Lichenes; occur as crusty patches or bushy growths on tree trunks or rocks or bare ground etc.
